after playing for almost 3 years across 2 accounts, i can say with confidence, if you want to get into this game, don't.

I only play it cuz all my friends do, and im cracked at killer in their eyes. I mainly only play stealth killers so i can scare the shit outa people 

But don't buy this game, its addicting and toxic, and the dev's don't care about the community.
 
Please for the love of god, dont play, but if you do, please play something else from time to time. This game is like a black hole for emotions, dont get pulled into it.

Yes the community is a little toxic, yes some of the maps could be better designed, but that's not going to stop me from loving this game. It's just good, dirty, blood soaked fun and that's really all I wanted from the game. Live out your fantasies of being an slasher movie killer, and take out your aggression on virtual teenagers, what's not to love about that? My play time is short on steam, but I've logged at least a hundred hours on gamepass before I got it here. This game really just is that fun.

Love this game!!

I for sure recommend this game, however it does have many flaws. The new player experience isn't all that great, for example I convinced a friend to buy and try it out and after a few rounds he got frustrated/bored and got off, ended up refunding the next day. It also has many, many glitches and a fairly toxic community, so get ready to bash your head into the wall a couple times. Other than that, this game is really fun, the DLCs unlock characters, however you can get them with in game currency but it will take a VERY long time to get them all. The game is really only that scary for the first week or so if your like me, then it gets to a point where your fun comes from looping the killer and having a lot of killer interaction because it feels sooooo good to loop a killer for 5 gens. Overall, its a fun game, just try and be positive and try not to let people's in game actions/things they say in post game chat to heart. Some people just want to be a dick, so they camp, tunnel, hit on hook, etc. Or for the survivor case, tbag, flashlight click, point at pallets, and that's fine. Assholes will be assholes, and while they're trying to make you mad, you can go to the next game and have fun.

Fantastic game, I can't believe I hadn't heard of this game for 4 years. Very casual play, which is great, and great style. Loving the customisation of the characters' perk load-out, and the characters themselves. Great selection of classic slashers and horror film/T.V. monsters. My favourite game to kill time from now on.
Would love to see more classic horror film characters in the future.

BUENARDO

The more I play this game the less fun I have with this game. It is a great game if you have some friends to play with, you can have good times with that. However between balaning desisions and not giving solo players the information that SWFs have and killers being either way too weak or too strong its hard to play this game at a higher rank. Unless you want to be a Meta slave it is not worth going for high ranks. Not that it even matters because of how bad the MM system is. On top of that there are some really nasty people that play this game that will discoruge some and driving away other players. A lot of entitalment in this community(altough it makes for some funny form posts). The game is not what it was back when I first started playing in 2018 and that has to do with both how the game has actully changed and personal changes with myself.

I have now spent almost 300 hours on this game and i can honestly say that this it's a super fun game, as long as you have friends to play it with because from my own experince with playing solo (and this can differ from player to player) it is not the best game to play alone, because i feel like you can't really get that teamwork that you need if you play alone, and since they don't have any type of real communication ingame (which btw they should add) i feel like solo is a no go for me but of course you might find it fun but me, not so much, and i honestly haven't played much killer but it's fun as long as you're not rank 20 (worst rank) as killer since that usually means it takes a long time to find a match, but to sum it all up i think it's an amazing game and would deffinetly recommend this to everybody who needs a new and refreshing game 9/10

After 2 years of playing this game now, I have come to the conclusion that the “hall of fam of horror” is just pandering to the LGBTQ+ community, LGBTQ is pretty cool and all but this is a horror game?? I don’t know why then keep spredding there cheeks to the LGBTQ community when the game doesn’t even work right and the last good chapter was the Blight witch was nearly 2 years ago. Also don’t think I have played with bigger pussys in my hole life (defo not MW2 kids), cry about everything like what perks I use or what killer I play. Don’t play much now because generally the game is on its last leg, witch is sad to see as I have meet some great people on there and made some good memories, but it seems they only care about making a small group of people happy and making the 100th Meg and Feng cosmetic's (most cosmetics are very bad, there is a reason you see most people using the same items) 🤡🤡💀💀👀🦆🏳️‍🌈👀🥶

O jogo é incrível. Uma grande metáfora da vida. Você passará ódio, raiva, vai querer EXPLODIR o computador, vai rir e chorar. Mas tudo isso vale a pena, se divertir não tem preço. Pagamento com a alma.

It's a game, I play it, but at this point I can't even begin to recommend it. 

Not optimized very well, you'll skip frames when turning quickly even though you're locked at 60fps.

The most toxic community since R6S - if you're not coming in with friends don't expect to have much fun.

Killer doesn't get the true power fantasy you'd expect from a killer, it's very easy for a killer to be bullied by a coordinated group of 4 survivors. Especially with the extremely broken matchmaking - I was going against Red Ranks three games in. If I was a true newbie to the game this could have ruined my expectations immediately.

I have played this game a lot on Xbox One, so I knew what I was in for, but it's one of those things that I would never recommend this game to others even though I'm an active player.
